'Dissolution' is a fantasy novel by Richard Lee Byers. It is the first book of
the [[War of the Spider Queen]] hexad, based on the Forgotten Realms setting of
the [[Dungeons & Dragons]] fantasy role-playing game.
categories: War of the Spider Queen novels
